factory

接口 Drawable

  • 所有已知实现类:
    Maze, Maze00, Maze01, Maze02

    public interface Drawable
    This interface Drawable defines the basic functions a maze should have

    Provided by Group, Color

    This interface Drawable defines the basic functions a maze should have.
    A maze should be customizable, enabled by customize.
    A maze could implement obstacle detection, enabled by isTouching and hasObstacle A maze could pass the necessary maze information to the javafx parent component, enabled by CreateMaze

    版本:
    1.03
    作者:
    Boon Giin Lee, Heng Yu, Chen Liao

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void CreateMaze(javafx.scene.Group root)
      Method CreateMaze draws the maze in the root group
      void customize(javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Method customize enables a user to self define the maze color
      java.lang.Boolean hasObstacle(double fromX, double toX, double fromY, double toY)
      Method hasObstacle determines if there is an obstacle in the current coordinate
      java.lang.Boolean isTouching(double x, double y, double padding)
      Method customize determines if other objects in game is touching the obstacles

    • 方法详细资料

      • customize

        void customize(javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
        Method customize enables a user to self define the maze color
        参数:
        color - : the color of maze.

      • isTouching

        java.lang.Boolean isTouching(double x,
                             double y,
                             double padding)
        Method customize determines if other objects in game is touching the obstacles
        参数:
        x - : the x axis value of the object
        y - : the y axis value of the object
        padding - : the radius of the object
        返回:
        : if the object is touching any obstacles

      • hasObstacle

        java.lang.Boolean hasObstacle(double fromX,
                              double toX,
                              double fromY,
                              double toY)
        Method hasObstacle determines if there is an obstacle in the current coordinate
        参数:
        fromX - : x axis starting point
        toX - : x axis termination point
        fromY - : y axis starting point
        toY - : y axis termination point
        返回:
        if there is an obstacle in the current coordinate

      • CreateMaze

        void CreateMaze(javafx.scene.Group root)
        Method CreateMaze draws the maze in the root group
        参数:
        root - : the root group for javafx
